title: Trends in Quantity over Time
description: Shows the quantity of products sold per day over a period of time.
request_sql: SELECT invoicedate, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM data GROUP BY invoicedate ORDER BY invoicedate

title: Top 5 Countries by Sales Volume
description: Displays the top 5 countries with the highest total sales volume.
request_sql: SELECT country, SUM(quantity) as total_sales FROM data GROUP BY country ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 5

title: Distribution of Unit Prices
description: Shows the distribution of unit prices across all product transactions.

title: Average Unit Price by Country
description: Displays the average unit price for each country where transactions have occurred.
request_sql: SELECT country, AVG(unitprice) as avg_unitprice FROM data GROUP BY country

title: Product Quantity Trends by Stockcode
description: Shows the quantity of each product sold over time.
request_sql: SELECT stockcode, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM data GROUP BY stockcode ORDER BY stockcode

title: Sales Volume by Product Description
description: Displays the total sales volume for each unique product description.
request_sql: SELECT description, SUM(quantity) as total_sales FROM data GROUP BY description ORDER BY total_sales DESC

title: Unit Price Trends by Stockcode
description: Shows the trend of unit price for each unique product over time.
request_sql: SELECT stockcode, AVG(unitprice) as avg_unitprice FROM data GROUP BY stockcode ORDER BY stockcode

title: Top 5 Products by Sales Volume
description: Displays the top 5 products with the highest total sales volume.
request_sql: SELECT stockcode, SUM(quantity) as total_sales FROM data GROUP BY stockcode ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 5

title: Customer Sales Volume by Date
description: Shows the total sales volume per customer on each day.
request_sql: SELECT invoicedate, SUM(quantity) as total_sales FROM data GROUP BY invoicedate, customerid ORDER BY invoicedate

title: Sales Volume by Customer
description: Displays the total sales volume for each unique customer.
request_sql: SELECT customerid, SUM(quantity) as total_sales FROM data GROUP BY customerid ORDER BY total_sales DESC
